name: Beepo
introduce: Beepo is an instant messaging social networking application built with the aim of solving problems with privacy, security, and data breach. It is integrated with a multichain chain crypto wallet, a web 3 browser, instant messaging and calling, an eCommerce store, and a sales catalog section for business accounts. Users can easily message their friends, family, and colleagues while storing, sending, and receiving cryptocurrency. People and businesses all over the world will be able to sell and purchase digital and physical items through the app.
